title: My pixel 2 xl wont turn on or reboot even with the volume down and power key combination.
content:
i had only 30% of batery left and all day ahead so i tun on my power saving and airplane mode so i can use it later on but still check the time.
After an our o  2 when i went to check the time the phone was off and didn''t respond to the power button.
when i get home put it to charge and left it for about 30 min and 2 ours after keep trying things without unplugging. i tried turn it on holding the power button and nothing, tried holding it longer an vibrates after 15 sec and nothing, tried even longer 30 sec vibrates again an the screen still black.
i have the always on display ON and when i have the phone plugged it showed the time and vibrates when i put my finger in the fingerprint reader but then it goes black when it should turn on.
i also tried the combination volume and power button but nothing
